page.title: 01THE 04400270 BLOCK. STRETTON
page.content: OUR AREA IS RURAL DESPITE THE FACT OF INCLUDING FOUR VILLAGES. THE MAIN VILLAGE IS{STRETTON ON DUNSMORE}WHICH IS LARGER THAN THE OTHER THREE. {FRANKTON}AND{BOURTON ON DUNSMORE}ARE SMALLER VILLAGES WHICH ORIGINALLY HAD MORE OF THEIR OWN FACILITIES BUT WHICH NOW RELY ON SURROUNDING VILLAGES FOR SCHOOLS AND LARGER SHOPS. ONLY A SMALL PART OF{PRINCETHORPE}WAS INCLUDED IN OUR GRID. THE SURROUNDING AREA IS MOSTLY FARMLAND WHICH IS EXTENSIVELY USED. THE AREA IS EASILY ACCESSIBLE TO ALL MAIN NATIONAL ROUTES AND FORMS OF TRANSPORT WITH COVENTRY ACTING AS THE NEAREST MAJOR CITY. THE{A45}RUNS ALONG THE NORTHERN SQUARES OF OUR GRID AND IS USED TO REACH THE{M1}AND{M6.
